name: Twosigma.github.com
body:
### About Two Sigma Investments

We're a technology company that applies a rigorous, scientific method-based approach to investment management. Since our founding in 2001, Two Sigma's vision has been to develop technological innovations that intelligently analyze the world's data to consistently deliver value for our clients.

Please see http://twosigma.com to learn more.

### Disclaimer

We'll be using http://github.com/twosigma to publish Two Sigma software. At the same time, we include a list of members, so that we can provide visibility to projects some of our employees contribute to. We aren't responsible for software provided by GitHub members listed there. We are responsible for repositories owned by twosigma.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
